label: PaymentFinancialInstitution
comment: An institution that provides financial services and financial transactions for payment.

datatypeProperties.comment: The Business Entity Identifier (BEI) as defined by ISO 9362 (Banking telecommunication messages, Bank Identifier Codes) for this financial identity.
The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) as defined by ISO 9362 (Banking telecommunication messages, Bank Identifier Codes) for this financial identity.
A branch name, expressed as text, for this payment financial institution.
The identifier of the branch name for this payment financial institution.
A Global Location Number (GLN) identifier for this trade party.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The identifier of the name for this payment financial institution.
The code specifying the role for this cooperating organization.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A communication specified for this payment financial institution.
A payment financial account specified for this payment financial institution.

referencedBy.comment: A creditor financial institution specified for this trade settlement payment means.
A debtor financial institution specified for this trade settlement payment means.
A financial institution specified for this trade settlement payment means.
